name: Blood Quest
description:
STORY:

Delve deep into the forest to achieve the ultimate prize! But be warned, when you use items to help you achieve your goal, it comes at the cost of your LIFE!

CONTROLS:

Left Click: Attack (must have weapon)

Space: Dash

Mouse Cursor: Look Direction

WASD: Move

Scroll Wheel: Switch Weapons

KNOWN BUGS:

  • If you run away from two bosses, and then kill a third boss, the game will crash.
  • Sometimes when  you press the play button you might get a black screen while the music plays on web. If this happens, refresh the browser or switch to another browser (chrome is the one that is the most tested, however firefox should work.  Edge does not seem to be supported).
